title: 25 Minute Ginger Steak Mango Cucumber Bowls
ingredients: ['lime juice', 'toasted sesame oil', 'fish sauce', 'fresh grated ginger', 'pickled ginger juice', 'honey', 'chili flakes', 'flank steak', 'tamari/soy sauce', 'Persian cucumbers, thinly sliced', 'pickled sushi ginger', 'mango, chopped', 'chopped fresh Thai basil/cilantro/mint', 'lime juice', 'avocado, sliced', 'salted peanuts, chopped']
ingredients with measurement: {'lime juice': '2', 'toasted sesame oil': '3', 'fish sauce': '1', 'fresh grated ginger': '1', 'pickled ginger juice': '2', 'honey': '2', 'chili flakes': 'seasoning', 'flank steak': '2', 'tamari/soy sauce': '2', 'Persian cucumbers, thinly sliced': '2-3', 'pickled sushi ginger': '1/4', 'mango, chopped': '1', 'chopped fresh Thai basil/cilantro/mint': '1/3', 'avocado, sliced': '1', 'salted peanuts, chopped': 'seasoning'}
instructions: ['1. To make the dressing. Combine all ingredients in a jar. Season to taste with chili flakes.', '2. In a bowl, toss the steak with tamari and 2-3 tablespoons of the dressing, rubbing the dressing onto the steak.', '3. Set your grill, grill pan, or skillet to medium-high heat. Grill the steak until lightly charred, 5-8 minutes for medium-rare, per side. Remove the steaks and allow them to rest for 5-10 minutes. Slice the steak.', '4. Meanwhile, in a bowl, toss the cucumbers with pickled ginger and 3 tablespoons dressing. In a separate bowl, toss the mango with herbs, lime juice, and chili flakes.', '5. Spoon the reserved dressing over the slices of steak, then serve the steak over bowls of rice. Top with cucumber, mango, avocado, and peanuts. Enjoy!']

title: The Italian Salad Sandwich
ingredients: ['extra virgin olive oil', 'champagne vinegar', 'fig preserves or 2 teaspoons honey', 'garlic, grated', 'fresh thyme leaves', 'salt and chili flakes', 'ciabatta bread, halved lengthwise', 'basil or sun-dried tomato pesto', 'sliced pepperoncini', 'fresh basil leaves', 'shaved parmesan', 'roasted red/orange peppers, sliced', 'spicy salami', 'prosciutto', 'thinly sliced pepperoni', 'provolone cheese', 'havarti, gouda, or provolone cheese', 'baby arugula']
ingredients with measurement: {'extra virgin olive oil': '1/2', 'champagne vinegar': '1/4', 'fig preserves or 2 teaspoons honey': '1', 'garlic, grated': '2', 'fresh thyme leaves': '2', 'salt and chili flakes': 'seasoning', 'ciabatta bread, halved lengthwise': '1', 'basil or sun-dried tomato pesto': '1/2', 'sliced pepperoncini': '1/2', 'fresh basil leaves': '1/2', 'shaved parmesan': '1/4', 'roasted red/orange peppers, sliced': '2', 'spicy salami': '6', 'prosciutto': '6', 'thinly sliced pepperoni': '2', 'provolone cheese': '6', 'havarti, gouda, or provolone cheese': '6', 'baby arugula': '3'}
instructions: ['1. To make the dressing. Combine all ingredients in a glass jar and whisk until smooth. Taste and adjust the salt and chili flakes', '2. Preheat the grill or grill pan to high.\xa0Rub each half of the bread with some dressing. Grill the bread, cut side down, for 3-5 minutes or until grill marks appear.', '3. Spread the pesto over the bottom piece of bread. In the following order, layer the pepperoncini, basil, parmesan, and sliced peppers. Drizzle with the dressing. Layer the prosciutto, salami, pepperoni, and cheese slices. Add the arugula and toss with the dressing. Add the top piece of ciabatta. Push down on the sandwich.', '4. Cut into 6 sandwiches. You can also wrap the uncut sandwich tightly and place it in the fridge for up to 1 day before serving.']

title: Grilled Buffalo Ranch Chicken Tacos
ingredients: ['boneless chicken tenders or small thighs', 'seasoned salt', 'chipotle chili powder', 'buffalo sauce', 'hard shell tacos', 'shredded Mexican cheese blend', 'shredded lettuce', 'cilantro, green onion, and avocado, for serving', 'sour cream or plain Greek yogurt', 'mayo', 'buttermilk', 'dried parsley', 'dried dill', 'garlic powder', 'onion powder', 'pickled jalapeños', 'salt', 'chopped fresh chives']
ingredients with measurement: {'boneless chicken tenders or small thighs': '2', 'seasoned salt': '2', 'chipotle chili powder': '1/2', 'buffalo sauce': '1', 'hard shell tacos': '12', 'shredded Mexican cheese blend': '2', 'shredded lettuce': '4', 'cilantro, green onion, and avocado, for serving': 'seasoning', 'sour cream or plain Greek yogurt': '1/2', 'mayo': '1/2', 'buttermilk': '1/2', 'dried parsley': '1', 'dried dill': '2', 'garlic powder': '1', 'onion powder': '1', 'pickled jalapeños': '1/4 -1/2', 'salt': '1', 'chopped fresh chives': '2'}
instructions: ['1. Set your grill, grill pan, or skillet to medium-high heat.', '2. In a bowl, toss the chicken, seasoned salt, and chili powder together. Add 1/3 cup buffalo sauce. Grill the chicken until lightly charred, 5-8 minutes per side, depending on the size of your chicken.', '3. Shred the meat and toss with 1/3 cup buffalo sauce. Reserve the remaining sauce for serving. Stuff a handful of cheese and chicken into each taco shell. Place the shells upright on the grill so nothing falls out. Cover and grill over low heat for 3-5 minutes until the cheese is melty.', '4. Meanwhile, make the Jalapeño Ranch. Combine all ingredients in a jar, mixing until creamy. Then, season with salt.', '5. Toss the lettuce with ranch, cilantro, scallions, and lime juice. Top each taco with greens, avocado, and extra sauce. Yum!']

title: Chicken Quesadillas with Creamy Chipotle Sauce
ingredients: ['canned chipotle chiles in adobo', 'extra virgin olive oil', 'garlic powder', 'onion powder', 'apple cider vinegar', 'honey', 'mayo', 'salt', 'large tortillas', 'Mexican cheese blend', 'fresh or frozen corn kernels', 'grilled chicken, sliced', 'cooked bacon, crumbled', 'pickled or candied jalapeños', 'avocado, cilantro, and limes, for serving']
ingredients with measurement: {'canned chipotle chiles in adobo': '1/2', 'extra virgin olive oil': '2', 'garlic powder': '1', 'onion powder': '1', 'apple cider vinegar': '2', 'honey': '1', 'mayo': '1/2', 'salt': 'seasoning', 'large tortillas': '4', 'Mexican cheese blend': '1 1/2', 'fresh or frozen corn kernels': '1-2', 'grilled chicken, sliced': '1-1 1/2', 'cooked bacon, crumbled': '6', 'pickled or candied jalapeños': '1/3', 'avocado, cilantro, and limes, for serving': 'seasoning'}
instructions: ["1. To make the dressing. Combine all ingredients in a blender and blend until smooth. Taste and adjust the salt. If it's too spicy, add extra mayo.", '2. To assemble, layer cheese, corn, chicken, bacon, and jalapeños, on one half of a tortilla. Drizzle over the chipotle dressing, then sprinkle over more cheese. Fold the tortilla over to cover everything.', '3. Heat a drizzle of olive oil in a skillet, add 1 quesadilla, and cook 2-3 minutes per side until crisp and golden brown. Serve warm with avocado, cilantro, lime and additional chipotle dressing.']

title: Sesame Ginger Steak Skewers with Peanut Sauce
ingredients: ['creamy peanut butter', 'tamari/soy sauce', 'Thai red curry paste', 'chopped pickled ginger', 'toasted sesame oil', 'sweet Thai chili sauce', 'tamari/soy sauce', 'garlic, chopped', 'fresh grated ginger', 'chili paste', 'flank steak, cubed', 'rice or coconut rice, for serving', 'limes, avocado, sesame seeds, and cilantro, for serving']
ingredients with measurement: {'creamy peanut butter': '1/2', 'tamari/soy sauce': '1/3', 'Thai red curry paste': '2-3', 'chopped pickled ginger': '1', 'toasted sesame oil': '1', 'sweet Thai chili sauce': '1/3', 'garlic, chopped': '6', 'fresh grated ginger': '1', 'chili paste': '2', 'flank steak, cubed': '2', 'rice or coconut rice, for serving': 'seasoning', 'limes, avocado, sesame seeds, and cilantro, for serving': 'seasoning'}
instructions: ['1. To make the peanut sauce. Add all ingredients to a glass jar or blender and blend to combine, adding water as needed to thin the sauce.', '2. In a bowl, mix the sweet Thai chili sauce, tamari/soy sauce, garlic, ginger, and chili paste. Add the beef and toss. If time allows, let sit for 10 minutes to deepen the flavor.', '3. Thread the beef onto the skewers.', '4. Set your grill, grill pan, or skillet to medium-high heat. Grill the skewers until lightly charred, turning them occasionally throughout cooking, about 8 to 12 minutes total, depending on your desired doneness.', '5. Serve the steak over plates of rice with limes, avocado, sesame seeds, cilantro, and peanut sauce. Keep extra peanut sauce on the side for dipping. Enjoy!']

title: Honey Lime Chili Chicken Bowls
ingredients: ['boneless chicken breasts or thighs', 'extra virgin olive oil', 'honey', 'garlic, chopped', 'chili powder', 'ground cumin', 'salt and chili flakes', 'bell peppers, sliced', 'yellow onion, sliced', 'cooked rice', 'cherry tomatoes, sliced', 'avocado, yogurt/sour cream + limes, for serving', 'fresh cilantro, chopped', 'salsa verde', 'extra virgin olive oil', 'honey', 'lime juice', 'flaky salt']
ingredients with measurement: {'boneless chicken breasts or thighs': '1 1/2', 'extra virgin olive oil': '1/4', 'honey': '1', 'garlic, chopped': '2', 'chili powder': '2', 'ground cumin': '1', 'salt and chili flakes': 'seasoning', 'bell peppers, sliced': '2', 'yellow onion, sliced': '1', 'cooked rice': '3-4', 'cherry tomatoes, sliced': '1', 'avocado, yogurt/sour cream + limes, for serving': 'seasoning', 'fresh cilantro, chopped': '1/2', 'salsa verde': '1/3', 'lime juice': '1/4', 'flaky salt': 'seasoning'}
instructions: ['1. Preheat the oven to 425° F.', '2. On a baking sheet, toss the chicken with olive oil, honey, garlic, chili powder, cumin, and season with chili flakes and salt.', '3. Add the bell peppers, onion, and 1 tablespoon of olive oil - season with salt. Arrange everything evenly on the pan. Bake for 20-25 minutes or until the chicken is cooked and the peppers begin to char.', '4. Meanwhile, make the vinaigrette. Toss all ingredients in a bowl and season with salt.', '5. Thinly slice the chicken. Serve the chicken and peppers over bowls of rice. Top the chicken with avocado and tomatoes. Add a dollop of yogurt and fresh cilantro.']

title: 3 Cheese Lemon Basil Pizza
ingredients: ['ball of pizza dough', 'extra virgin olive oil', 'grated parmesan cheese', 'toasted sesame seeds', 'fresh thyme leave', 'garlic, chopped', 'shallot, halved, and leaves separated', 'chili flakes', 'honey', 'shredded mozzarella cheese', 'shredded provolone cheese', 'Meyer or regular lemon thinly sliced', 'so much fresh basil']
ingredients with measurement: {'ball of pizza dough': '1/2', 'extra virgin olive oil': '1', 'grated parmesan cheese': '1/4', 'toasted sesame seeds': '2', 'fresh thyme leave': '1', 'garlic, chopped': '2', 'shallot, halved, and leaves separated': '1', 'chili flakes': 'seasoning', 'honey': '1', 'shredded mozzarella cheese': '3/4', 'shredded provolone cheese': '3/4', 'Meyer or regular lemon thinly sliced': '1', 'so much fresh basil': 'seasoning'}
instructions: ['1. Preheat the oven to 450° F.', "2. On a lightly floured surface, push the dough out until it's thin (about a 10-12 inch circle). Transfer the dough to a baking sheet. Lightly brush the crust with olive oil, then sprinkle with parmesan, sesame seeds, thyme, garlic, shallots, and chili flakes. Drizzle over the honey.", '3. Add the mozzarella and provolone. Arrange the lemon slices over the cheese, top with a handful or torn basil leaves.', '4. Bake for 10-15 minutes or until the crust is golden and the cheese is bubbling. Remove from the oven and top with 2 big handfuls fresh basil. Slice and enjoy!']

title: 20 Minute Crispy Orange Garlic Chicken
ingredients: ['orange juice', 'tamari or soy sauce', 'honey', 'chopped pickled ginger, plus 1 tablespoon ginger juice', 'chili paste', 'toasted sesame oil', 'black pepper and chili flakes', 'sesame oil', 'ground chicken', 'arrowroot powder or cornstarch', 'salted butter', 'garlic, chopped', 'chopped broccoli', 'toasted sesame/peanuts', 'green onions, chopped']
ingredients with measurement: {'orange juice': '1/3', 'tamari or soy sauce': '1/3', 'honey': '1-2', 'chopped pickled ginger, plus 1 tablespoon ginger juice': '1', 'chili paste': '3-4', 'toasted sesame oil': '1', 'black pepper and chili flakes': 'seasoning', 'sesame oil': '3', 'ground chicken': '1 1/2', 'arrowroot powder or cornstarch': '1', 'salted butter': '3', 'garlic, chopped': '4', 'chopped broccoli': '1 1/2', 'toasted sesame/peanuts': '2', 'green onions, chopped': '4'}
instructions: ['1. To make the sauce. Combine all ingredients in a glass jar.', '2. In a large skillet, combine the oil, chicken, cornstarch, pepper, and chili flakes. Cook over medium heat, breaking up the meat as it cooks until browned, about 5 minutes. Add the butter and garlic. Cook 2 minutes, until the butter browns and the chicken gets crispy.', '3. Pour over the sauce. Cook until the sauce thickens slightly. Then, add the broccoli. Cook another 2-5 minutes. Remove from the heat.', '4. Serve the chicken, broccoli, and remaining sauce over bowls of rice. Top with sesame seeds and green onion. Enjoy!']

title: Sheet Pan Steak Tacos
ingredients: ['flank or skirt steak', 'garlic, chopped', 'chipotle chili powder', 'onion powder', 'smoked paprika', 'orange juice', 'tamari or soy sauce', 'honey', 'extra virgin olive oil', 'jalapeños', 'warmed corn or flour tortillas', 'avocado, feta cheese, and shredded lettuce, for serving', 'mango chunks', 'lime juice', 'chopped cilantro', 'sea salt']
ingredients with measurement: {'flank or skirt steak': '1 1/2', 'garlic, chopped': '6', 'chipotle chili powder': '1', 'onion powder': '1', 'smoked paprika': '1', 'orange juice': '1/2', 'tamari or soy sauce': '1/4', 'honey': '1', 'extra virgin olive oil': '2', 'jalapeños': '1 -2', 'warmed corn or flour tortillas': 'seasoning', 'avocado, feta cheese, and shredded lettuce, for serving': 'seasoning', 'mango chunks': '1', 'lime juice': '2', 'chopped cilantro': '1/4', 'sea salt': 'seasoning'}
instructions: ['1. Preheat the oven to 475° F. Line a baking sheet with parchment paper or rub with oil.', '2. On the sheet pan, toss together the steak, garlic, chipotle chili powder, onion powder, paprika, orange juice, tamari/soy sauce, honey and olive oil. If time allows, marinate for 20 to 30 minutes.', '3.  Arrange 1-2 jalapeños around the steak. When ready, bake for 10 minutes. Switch the oven to broil. Broil for 2-5 minutes until the meat is crisping. Watch closely. Let the meat rest for 10 minutes, then thinly slice and toss with the sauce on the pan.', '4. Meanwhile, make the salsa. Combine all ingredients in a bowl. Grab the jalapeños from the sheet pan. If desired, deseed, then chop and toss with the salsa.', '5. Stuff the steak into warm tortillas. Top as desired with lettuce, avocado, salsa, cheese, and additional sauce. Enjoy!']

title: Thai Basil Chicken and Garlic Butter Noodles
ingredients: ['chicken breasts, thinly sliced', 'shallot, sliced', 'yellow curry powder', 'black pepper', 'chili flakes', 'ghee or extra virgin olive oil', 'fish sauce or tamari (or use soy sauce)', 'honey', 'asparagus or broccoli, chopped', 'rice noodles', 'salted butter', 'garlic, chopped', 'canned coconut milk', 'Thai or sweet basil', 'sliced green onions + limes, for serving']
ingredients with measurement: {'chicken breasts, thinly sliced': '1', 'shallot, sliced': '1', 'yellow curry powder': '2', 'black pepper': '1-2', 'chili flakes': 'seasoning', 'ghee or extra virgin olive oil': '3', 'fish sauce or tamari (or use soy sauce)': '2', 'honey': '2', 'asparagus or broccoli, chopped': '1', 'rice noodles': '8', 'salted butter': '3', 'garlic, chopped': '4', 'canned coconut milk': '1', 'Thai or sweet basil': '1/2', 'sliced green onions + limes, for serving': 'seasoning'}
instructions: ['1. Preheat the oven to 450° F.', '2. On a baking sheet, mix the chicken with the shallots, curry powder, pepper, and chili flakes. Toss to coat, then add 2 tablespoons ghee/oil, fish sauce, and honey, and toss again. Arrange the chicken in an even layer. Arrange the asparagus to the side of the chicken and toss with 1 tablespoon ghee/oil. Season with salt and pepper.', '3. Bake for 15-20 minutes, until the chicken is cooked. Then toss with the Thai basil.', '4. Meanwhile, make the noodles. Melt the butter in a skillet set over medium heat. Add the garlic and a pinch of chili flakes. Cook until the garlic begins to caramelize and turn light golden brown, 1 to 2 minutes. Stir in the coconut milk and cook for 3-5 minutes, until warmed through.\xa0Season with salt. Remove from the heat and toss the noodles with the sauce.', '5. To serve, divide the noodles among bowls and top with chicken and asparagus. Serve with additional basil, green onions, and limes. Enjoy!']
